abilities.name: Darkest Impulse
abilities.text: As long as Dark Ampharos is in play, whenever your opponent plays an Evolution card from his or her hand to evolve 1 of his or her Pokémon, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Darkest Impulse Poké-Body each turn.

attacks.name: Shock Bolt
attacks.text: Discard all Lightning Energy attached to Dark Ampharos.
